biotools.summary:
A python library for reading, writing, and converting computational chemistry file formats and generating input files.

IOData is a HORTON 3 module for input/output of quantum chemistry file formats. Documentation is here: https://iodata.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html.

bioschemas.name: IOData
